column5: Hello, This is my first posting to this site and reading through past messages has already helped out quite a bit.I am intersted to know if anyone can offer some words of wisdom on fishing in Brereton Lake at this time of year. I know this is a heavily fished lake but I am sure there must be some walleye in there. I 'm not sure whether they would be deep/shallow or what kind of structure they would be holding on or what presentations might catch them. Also, has the fall turnover happened yet?Many thanks in advance,Jimmy
